function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of practical application evaluation of UVGI in health care buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of ineffective disinfection in health care buildings","Mitigation":"Conduct practical evaluations of UVGI in health care buildings to understand its efficacy in real-world settings","Technologies":"UVGI systems","People":"Health care building occupants, patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health care authorities, designers, engineers"},{"Description":"Insufficient knowledge base and guidelines for UVGI application in health care","Impact":"Risk of inadequate decision-making for UVGI implementation in health care buildings","Mitigation":"Expand the knowledge base through research and development, and create comprehensive guidelines for UVGI application in health care buildings","Technologies":"UVGI systems, research and development","People":"Health care authorities, designers, engineers, researchers","Owner":"Health care authorities, researchers, designers, engineers"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the practical application of UVGI in health care buildings","Impact":"Potential for design failures and ineffective disinfection in health care buildings","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive testing and evaluation of UVGI systems under real-world conditions, and validate performance with actual contaminants of interest","Technologies":"UVGI systems, testing equipment","People":"Health care building occupants, patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Designers, engineers, healthcare authorities"}]}
